name: Brick Off
description:
Brick Off is a block breaker-like game where the objective is to break all the blocks. 

Players have used a paddle shield to deflect any incoming balls and prevent the ball from going to the bottom.

Currently there are 2 playable characters with unique abilities to play with.

Controls

A/D - Move Left/Right

F or Right Click - Use Power

Space or Left Click - Use Paddle Shield or Throws a Ball

ESC / P - Pause
